item.title: Notes on Know Your Data: The Stats behind the Alerts
item.description: I came across this amazing video from Dave McAllister in the “WTF is SRE 2023” conference on the statistics behind the alerts. Thanks to Dave for his clear explanation of the various concepts. Here are my notes on the video: Mean vs Median vs Mode - Mean = Measure of central tendency, the average value Median - In a sorted data set, median is the middle value Mode - Mode is the frequently used value in a dataset Arithmetic mean - Not the 50% mark.
